alert.note: Alert for Autauga; Dallas; Elmore; Lowndes; Marengo (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 31 at 2:46AM CDT until November 02 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the first Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 32 possible. For the second Freeze Watch, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 28 possible. * WHERE...Marengo, Dallas, Autauga, Lowndes and Elmore Counties. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Watch, from late tonight through Wednesday morning. For the second Freeze Watch, from Wednesday evening through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
